sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: egrep (link to grep), fgrep (link to grep) and grep

sect4.title: egrep
sect4.para: egrep prints lines from files matching an extended regular expression pattern.

sect4.title: fgrep
sect4.para: fgrep prints lines from files matching a list of fixed strings, separated by newlines, any of which is to be matched.

sect4.title: grep
sect4.para: grep prints lines from files matching a basic regular expression pattern.
